<p>
December 26. [<a href="http://www.familytales.org/results.php?year=1867">1867</a>]
</p><p>
MY DEAR <a href="http://www.familytales.org/results.php?tla=ezk" rel="met friend">LIZZIE</a> : Your letters just received. I have just written to K. to withdraw the 
C. Go to him yourself the moment you receive this. The idea of Congress doing anything is 
ridiculous. How much could effect if he chose, through others. G-o to B. & K. the moment you receive this. 
</p><p>
Yours,<a href="http://www.familytales.org/results.php?tla=mtl" rel="me">M. L.</a>
</p>
